* Shadow Cat and Snow Tech began to get annoyed. Is
this how they treat new-comers? They decided that the
only way to get in is to just walk strait in. Whether
they liked it or not. They picked up their cases and
stepped cautiously out into the clearing, watching the
auto-guns and praying they didn't mistake them for
predacons. When the guns didn't turn on them they
slowly inched there way towards the door. shadow Cat
stopped close to the door, and, turning to Snow Tech
said,*

 " I think we should at least inform them we are
coming in, whether they ignore it or not, it wouldn't
be wise to surprise them, they could take it the wrong
way."

 * Snow Tech nodded,*

 " Yeah, this is the weirdest place I've been on,
Predacons begging to get in and all, i wonder what our
fellow maximals are like?"

 *Shadow Cat smirked at his shallow attempt to humor
her. but he was right in a sense. it was unusual for
predacons to beg, for anything. She nodded to him and
he switched on his com-link once more,*

 " This is Shadow Cat and Snow Tech, we are entering
your base,(since you didn't reply the first time, He
grumbled and Shadow Cat smacked him) We ARE Maximals!
I repeat We are maximals and are coming in!"

 * and with that they stood strait and entered the
metallic door-way which held two possibilities, 1.
Death or 2. Iron Raptor.*
